choices.B: The extent to which the software can be used by many different users
choices.C: The capability of the software to be moved to a different platform
choices.D: The capability of one system to be coupled with another system
choices.A: The extent to which the software can be used in other applications

content: A disadvantage of using design patterns includes which  of the following?

choices.D: They are programmed into each application that uses it
choices.A: They prevent subtle issues that cause major problems
choices.B: They enhance code readability for architects and coders
